page.title: 08OUR WALK ACROSS THE HEATH.
page.content: Our group walked along the public footpaths across Orsett Heath.We entered some fields that belonged to Mr.Hew Watt a local farmer.The footpath led into some corn fields,having got out of these fields we came into a pea field.Some of us picked the pods and ate the peas inside them.Having walked across quite a few more corn and pea fields,we came to a stile.Having climbed over the stile,we found ourselves by the edge of the A13.The group rested for a while before starting our way back.We walked back through some woods and soon arrived back at school.When we got back to the classroom,we sorted out our pea pods and heads of corn and did some follow up work.
